file_content.text: You again? Don't think there's much I can do for you.
So the Imperials come in with three astromech droids, and I'm thinking to myself--
Other customer. You see?
I see. You want something? I'm a little busy, here.
I'm looking for a man. "Dragon Eyes." You heard of him?
I need information.
Thought I'd pay a visit, have a drink or two. That a problem?
Just here to chat.
No... most strangers have reasons for coming here, though.
I've got my reasons, but I don't need them made public. You know the name "Dragon Eyes"?
Can you keep this quiet?
You want discretion? You are in the wrong place!
Don't suppose you've heard of a man called "Dragon Eyes"?
Speaking of strangers...
Look, I'll be straight--there's this guy, Dragon Eyes, and I need to find him fast.
I'm desperate for help.
In trouble, are you? Sound like you are hopeless!
Shut up, you.
Dragon Eyes... doesn't ring any bells, but that don't mean much. What's this guy to you?
You're going to tell me how to find Dragon Eyes, and you're going to tell me now.
I want Dragon Eyes!
Whoa, whoa! I don't know what you're talking about.
I am drinking. I do not notice this.
Look, a lot of people pass through here. I can't keep track of them all. What's this guy to you?
The two of us have shared interests. A meeting could be profitable.
We have business together.
Not your concern.
Well, I'll keep an ear out, but I can't promise much.
If you say so. Sorry I can't be any real help.
Dragon Eyes cheated me, betrayed me and almost got me killed. I want to repay the favor.
I want him dead.
I won't stop you. Just don't shoot up the place, huh? Please?
Let's ask around, see if one of these losers can find a clue....
We'll start questioning the others. A few credits may loosen lips.
Ask around all you want, though. Not my bother.
Good news. An old Rodian left the cantina a few minutes ago. Fidgety, nervous--I'm tracking him. Might be going to Dragon Eyes.
The bad news is ghost cell assassins are all over. They're coming to kill you.
How do you know they're after me?
You're sure?
They're watching the cantina. Don't see anyone else they'd want to kill.
Didn't expect them so soon.
That was fast.
Yeah. Sorry.
They've got stealth tech and street clothes. No way to find and fight them all.
Let them try. I won't make it easy.
I can take them.
Yeah, I bet you won't. But say you survive--half of them are using stealth tech, half of them are disguised as locals.
You won't find them all. They'll keep following, waiting, and sooner or later you'll have a knife in your throat. It's how they work.
You need to get them off your back and now. Take the offensive--draw them into an ambush.
Any specific suggestions?
How?
Got it.
I know my job, thanks.
If that were true, there wouldn't be a ghost cell, would there?
Grab a speeder out of town. There's an old wind farm not far... plenty of cover, and dust's good for jamming stealth. Should hide the bodies, too.
Look, I have to go--they'll be looking for me. Talk later.
Can't you see I'm busy? I can't serve you now.
